message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $160. I'd be willing to meet you at $140. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and $160, which would be $150. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still not willing to go up to $150. I'm willing to meet you at $130. Can you consider that?
